items.sentence: Tom has helped a lot of people in this town.
Tom has helped a lot of people quit smoking.
Tom has just come back from the supermarket.
Tom wasn\'t the only one who showed up late.
Tom certainly has confidence in his ability.
Tom certainly is good at making new friends.
Tom certainly looks nothing like his father.
Tom was born in Boston and he grew up there.
Tom was guilty of spreading lies about Mary.
Tom was listening with his eyes half closed.
Tom was the one who designed these costumes.
Tom will be in Boston next week on business.
Tom suddenly realized what he had just done.
Tom suggested that I go to Boston with Mary.
Tom suggested to Mary that she study harder.
Tom surprised Mary with a kiss on the cheek.
I could barely speak French three years ago.
I could be wrong, but I think Tom likes you.
I could hear an owl hooting in the distance.
I could hear footsteps coming up the stairs.
I could hear the dog barking all night long.
Tom thought that Mary was going to kiss him.
Tom thought the meeting was a waste of time.
Tom told Mary everything she wanted to know.
Tom told Mary that John was looking for her.
Tom told Mary that she was wasting her time.
Tom didn\'t know where Mary had gone skiing.
Tom didn\'t know who Mary was going to meet.
Tom didn\'t know who had written the letter.
Tom didn\'t let me finish what I was saying.
Tom is probably a few years older than Mary.
Tom is probably able to speak French by now.
Tom is probably just outside the front door.
There are a lot of tall buildings in Boston.
Tom could\'ve and should\'ve done something.
Tom could\'ve and should\'ve said something.
I want to learn to play the guitar like you.
I want to thank you all for a job well done.
I want you to come work here at our company.
I want you to take charge of this operation.
Have you ever heard someone speaking French?
I\'m afraid it\'s going to be crowded there.
I\'m afraid we\'ve got quite a problem here.
Tom doesn\'t need to be at today\'s meeting.
I think Tom has done that at least one time.
I think Tom is a lot better player than you.
I think Tom is concealing something from me.
Tom hasn\'t finished writing the report yet.
Tom hasn\'t written a letter in a long time.
I want you to know I\'m here if you need me.
